articles.author: Ewa Krukowska, John Ainger
articles.title: EU, Germany Reach Deal on Car Emissions That Allows for E-Fuels - Bloomberg
articles.description: Germany reached an agreement with the European Union on a landmark regulation that requires new cars to be carbon neutral by 2035, resolving a dispute that threatened to undermine the bloc’s ambitious blueprint to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
